lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Nivison said that the deal contains a convenent which states that if the company's debt to equity ratio exceeds two to one the debentures cannot be converted unless the company obtains a bank guarantee or a letter of credit.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: IRT Property Co, a real estate investment trust based in Atlanta, Georgia, has launched a 30 mln dlr convertible subordinated debenture in the Euromarket, a partner of Chandler Partnership Ltd said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In addition, holders will be able to surrender half the bonds during May 1991 at 123 pct for a semi-annual yield of 7.043 pct and the other half in May 1993 at 140 pct, for a yield of 7.383 pct.
